markdownRemark.excerpt: Hi all, It’s been a while since I jot down any tech ideas outside of work. My career has changed much in the last several years. I no longer code in JavaScript…
markdownRemark.html:
Hi all,

It’s been a while since I jot down any tech ideas outside of work. My career has changed much in the last several years. I no longer code in JavaScript building frontends or backends. I don’t even write any golang much. There is barely any time to program in these days of my infrastructure enginerring career.

Mostly, terraform and HCL consume me, and so does other aspects of infrastructure engineering. I work in a small but talented team for a cloud footprint optimization shop. Check us out when you get a chance at stormforge.io.

Other technologies I work with on a day-to-day basis are kubectl, kustomize, argo-cd and a whole host of other monitoring tools that are there to make our lives easier in the operations world. Here, I plan on dropping in from time to time, and share my learnings.

Best.

frontmatter.title: New Beginnings
frontmatter.description: I am reigniting my tech blog after a long hiatus from any kind of technical writing.
